response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $750,000. This offer reflects my desire to find a worthy owner who appreciates its true worth and will cherish it as much as I have. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you need more information about the product. I look forward to hearing from you soon.", "product_price": 750000}
